result.execSummary:
The defendant Jess M.J. Furey was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jess M.J. Furey is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jess M.J. Furey was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

records.addlTxt:
Defendant, Jess M J Furey with Attorney Donna Burger appeared.  Prosecuting attorney Holly D. Wood Webster.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(10:51)  MULTIPLE CASES HEARD.
State - have resolution 15CF70 plea to Ct 2 - 90 days jail imposed & stayed - 24 mo revo, assess dom abuse & anger mgmt - no contact with Megan Hubbard $443 & $100 dom abuse - dismiss Ct 1 & 3
15CF210 - plea to ct 1 & 6 - Ct 1 - 24 mo dagp - ct 6 w/held sent 24 mo prob, 30 days jail or 6 hrs per day comm serv for 30 days - assess - fulltime school/employemnt - dna sample - follow all rules $443, $10 drug surchg - dismiss Ct 2,3,4, 5 & 15CM218
Victim in courtroom and wishes to have contact

Burger - argues no contact - parties live together and it's not a current condition of bond
Ms Hubbard addresses the court

Deft - 15CF70 Ct 2 - pleads no contest - waives rights & JT
          15CF210 Ct 1 - pleads no contest - waives rights & JT
          15CF210 Ct 6 - pleads no contest - waives rights & JT

COURT:  pleas voluntary to all

15CF70 Ct 2 - finds deft guilty
           $243 cc
           $200 dna surchg
           $100 dom abuse surchg
***PAYMENT PLAN***
          w/held sentence 24 mo probation 
          90 days jail imposed & stayed
           AODA assess dom abuse &/or anger mgmt
           credit 2 days if revoked

15CF210 Ct 1 - defers acceptance 24 months
 
                 Ct 6 - finds deft guilty
                  w/held sentence 24 month probation concurrent to 15CF70
                 $243 cc
                 $200 dna surchg
                 $  10 drug surchg
***BOND APPLIES - BALANCE ON PAYMENT PLAN
  CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
            30 days jail or 6 hrs per day comm serv for 30 days (180 hrs total) community service completed by Dec 1, 2016 or report to jail
            AODA assess 
            fulltime school/employment - dna sample -
            credit 14 days if revoked
follow all rules in both matters

DISMISS:  15CM218 (& read-in), 15CF70 Ct 1 & 3, 15CF210 Ct 2, 3, 4, 5 
  Review hearing scheduled for December 11, 2017 at 08:30 am.
